languages.text: "М, конечно же... я слышу твой заполошный пульс, {name}". {n}Друкари склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Что же ты чувствуешь, взирая на меня? Первобытный страх? Парализующий ужас? Или необъяснимый трепет? Позволь мне объяснить: ты заворожен{mf||а} близостью к гибели и твое сознание опьянено невероятностью того, что ты все же еще жив{mf||а}. Но ты не можешь осознать это, ибо не постигаешь пределов своих ощущений из-за ограничений. Ограничений, от которых избавлен мой мир".

"Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."
languages.original_text: "М, конечно же... я слышу твой заполошный пульс, {name}". {n}Друкари склоняет голову набок.{/n} "Что же ты чувствуешь, взирая на меня? Первобытный страх? Парализующий ужас? Или необъяснимый трепет? Позволь мне объяснить: ты заворожен{mf||а} близостью к гибели и твое сознание опьянено невероятностью того, что ты все же еще жив{mf||а}. Но ты не можешь осознать это, ибо не постигаешь пределов своих ощущений из-за ограничений. Ограничений, от которых избавлен мой мир".

Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

languages.text: “啊，没错……我能听到你狂乱的脉搏，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋歪着头。{/n}“当你看着我时，你感觉到了什么？是原始的恐惧？是令人窒息的恐怖？还是无以言表的敬畏？请允许我来解释一下吧：是接近死亡的感觉让你着了迷。你依然存在着，而你的潜意识因为这个几乎不可能的事实而狂喜不已。不过，你本人并没有意识到这一点，因为你们从来都不允许自己探索一切感觉的极限。然而，在我的世界里，却并没有这样的限制。”
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

traits.locale_text: “啊，没错……我能听到你狂乱的脉搏，{name}。”{n}玛拉斋歪着头。{/n}“当你看着我时，你感觉到了什么？是原始的恐惧？是令人窒息的恐怖？还是无以言表的敬畏？请允许我来解释一下吧：是接近死亡的感觉让你着了迷。你依然存在着，而你的潜意识因为这个几乎不可能的事实而狂喜不已。不过，你本人并没有意识到这一点，因为你们从来都不允许自己探索一切感觉的极限。然而，在我的世界里，却并没有这样的限制。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「あぁ…お前の激しい鼓動の音が聞こえるぜ、{name}」{n}デュカーリが首を傾げる。{/n}「俺を見て何を感じる？本能的な恐怖？体が動かなくなるほどの脅威？説明のつかない畏敬？俺が教えてやる。隣り合わせの恐怖にゾクゾクしてるんだ。生きることが望みの薄い状況に、お前の意識はどんどんボヤけていっている。だがお前は、その事実に気づいていない。感覚のテッペンの開拓を阻まれているからだ。俺の世界にはない制約だな」
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

traits.locale_text: 「あぁ…お前の激しい鼓動の音が聞こえるぜ、{name}」{n}デュカーリが首を傾げる。{/n}「俺を見て何を感じる？本能的な恐怖？体が動かなくなるほどの脅威？説明のつかない畏敬？俺が教えてやる。隣り合わせの恐怖にゾクゾクしてるんだ。生きることが望みの薄い状況に、お前の意識はどんどんボヤけていっている。だがお前は、その事実に気づいていない。感覚のテッペンの開拓を阻まれているからだ。俺の世界にはない制約だな」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Ah, sí... puedo oír cómo se te acelera el pulso, {name}». {n}El drukhari ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Qué sientes cuando me miras? ¿Un pánico visceral? ¿Un terror paralizante? ¿Un inexplicable respeto reverencial? Deja que te lo explique: lo que te fascina es la inminencia de tu muerte. Tu consciencia desfallece ante el improbable hecho de tu existencia continuada. Pero no sabes reconocerlo porque te han impedido explorar los límites de tus sensaciones. En mi mundo no existen tales restricciones».
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

traits.locale_text: «Ah, sí... puedo oír cómo se te acelera el pulso, {name}». {n}El drukhari ladea la cabeza.{/n} «¿Qué sientes cuando me miras? ¿Un pánico visceral? ¿Un terror paralizante? ¿Un inexplicable respeto reverencial? Deja que te lo explique: lo que te fascina es la inminencia de tu muerte. Tu consciencia desfallece ante el improbable hecho de tu existencia continuada. Pero no sabes reconocerlo porque te han impedido explorar los límites de tus sensaciones. En mi mundo no existen tales restricciones».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Ah, oui... J'entends d'ici votre pouls qui s'emballe, {name}. Que ressentez-vous lorsque vous me regardez ? {n}demande-t-il en penchant la tête sur le côté.{/n} Une peur instinctive ? Une terreur paralysante ? Un inexplicable sentiment d'admiration ? Permettez que j'éclaire votre lanterne : la vérité, c'est que vous êtes {mf|hypnotisé|hypnotisée} de voir la mort de si près. Votre conscience défaille à la pensée que votre existence puisse s'achever ici et maintenant, mais cette sensation vous est totalement étrangère, car on vous a toujours {mf|empêché|empêchée} d'explorer les limites de vos facultés sensorielles. Autant d'interdits qui n'ont pas cours dans mon monde. »
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

traits.locale_text: « Ah, oui... J'entends d'ici votre pouls qui s'emballe, {name}. Que ressentez-vous lorsque vous me regardez ? {n}demande-t-il en penchant la tête sur le côté.{/n} Une peur instinctive ? Une terreur paralysante ? Un inexplicable sentiment d'admiration ? Permettez que j'éclaire votre lanterne : la vérité, c'est que vous êtes {mf|hypnotisé|hypnotisée} de voir la mort de si près. Votre conscience défaille à la pensée que votre existence puisse s'achever ici et maintenant, mais cette sensation vous est totalement étrangère, car on vous a toujours {mf|empêché|empêchée} d'explorer les limites de vos facultés sensorielles. Autant d'interdits qui n'ont pas cours dans mon monde. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Ah, ja ... Ich höre Euren Puls förmlich rasen, {name}." {n}Der Drukhari legt den Kopf zur Seite.{/n} "Was spürt Ihr, wenn Ihr mich anseht? Urängste? Entsetzliches Grauen? Unerklärliche Ehrfurcht? Lasst es mich Euch erklären: Ihr seid fasziniert davon, wie nah Ihr dem Tod seid. Euer Bewusstsein wird von einem Schwindel erfasst angesichts der unwahrscheinlichen Tatsache des Fortbestehens Eurer Existenz. Aber das könnt Ihr nicht erkennen, weil Ihr daran gehindert wurdet, die Grenzen Eurer Empfindungen zu verschieben. In meiner Welt existieren keine solchen Einschränkungen."
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

Unerklärliche Ehrfurcht? Lasst es mich Euch erklären: Ihr seid fasziniert davon, wie nah Ihr dem Tod seid. Euer Bewusstsein wird von einem Schwindel erfasst angesichts der unwahrscheinlichen Tatsache des Fortbestehens Eurer Existenz. Aber das könnt Ihr nicht erkennen, weil Ihr daran gehindert wurdet, die Grenzen Eurer Empfindungen zu verschieben. In meiner Welt existieren keine solchen Einschränkungen."

languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, ." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

languages.text: "Ah, evet... Kalbinin çılgına dönmüşçesine attığını duyabiliyorum {name}." {n}Drukhari kafasını eğiyor.{/n} "Bana baktığında ne hissediyorsun? İlkel bir korku mu? Felç edici bir dehşet mi? Açıklanamaz bir hayranlık mı? İzninle açıklayayım. Ölüme bu kadar yaklaşmanın tesiri altındasın. Bilincin, varlığının devamının pek de mümkün olmayışı gerçeğiyle kendinden geçiyor. Ancak bunun farkında değilsin çünkü algılarının sınırlarını keşfetmekten alıkonuluyorsun. Böylesi kısıtlamalar, benim dünyamda bulunmaz."
languages.original_text: "Ah, yes... I can hear your frantic pulse, {name}." {n}The Drukhari tilts his head.{/n} "What is it you feel when you look at me? Primal fear? Paralysing horror? Inexplicable awe? Allow me to explain: you are enthralled by your proximity to death. Your consciousness is swooning at the unlikely fact of your continued existence. But you do not recognise this, because you have been prevented from exploring the limits of your sensation. No such constraints exist in my world."

Böylesi kısıtlamalar, benim dünyamda bulunmaz."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
